data.name: Diamond Space  - Platinum Donator Package
data.detailed_description:
Thank you for looking into donating to Diamond Space, all donations go directly towards our development fund to place bounties on features and bugs that need to be fixed!
Please note that this DLC does not contain any ingame content although donators do get the following benefits:

- Be held in high regard by all in the community
- Be allowed to chastise contributors for not working hard enough for a month
- Be given permanent access to the Alpha branch on Steam

Please note that this DLC does not contain any ingame content although donators do get the some benefits.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: IGPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: Same as Main game (No actual content included)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: Same as Main game (No actual content included)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OSX Yosemite
  • Processor: 1.5ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: IGPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: Same as Main game (No actual content included)
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: latest

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M 1 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: Same as Main game (No actual content included)
